Row.Text: Frontier Expansion
Gain 100 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold every time you improve a [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource.

[BLIST][LI]Gain [B]100 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold[/B] every time you improve a [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] [B]Resource[/B].[LI][B]+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production [/B]towards constructing the [B]Statue of Liberty[/B].[/LIST]
+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being America's associated [icon:WONDER] Wonder.
River Raids

Gain [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture when [icon:Action_Pillage] Pillaging Buildings or Improvements equal to the other Yield or [icon:Action_Heal] Healing gained. Land Military Units gain the Amphibious ability. Civilian and Support Units gain +3 [icon:Action_Move] Movement Speed while Embarked.

[BLIST][LI]Gain [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] [B]Culture[/B] when [icon:Action_Pillage] [B]Pillaging Buildings[/B] or [B]Improvements[/B] equal to the other [B]Yield or [icon:Action_Heal] Healing gained[/B].[LI][B]Land Military Units[/B] gain the [B]Amphibious[/B] ability. [B]Civilian and Support Units[/B] gain +3 [icon:Action_Move] Movement Speed while [B]Embarked[/B].[LI][B]+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production[/B] towards constructing [B]Muzibu Azaala Mpanga[/B].[/LIST]
+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being Buganda's associated [icon:WONDER] Wonder.
Liberté, Egalité, Fraternité
You can select the [icon:CELEBRATION] Celebration effects of any standard [icon:GOVERNMENT] Government in Modern Age.
You have the passive effects of all standard Governments in Modern Age, and can select from any of their Celebration effects.

[BLIST][LI]You can select the [icon:CELEBRATION] [B]Celebration effects[/B] of any standard [icon:GOVERNMENT] [B]Government[/B] in Modern Age.[LI][B]+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production [/B]towards constructing the [B]Eiffel Tower[/B].[/LIST]

[LIST][LI]You have the [B]passive effects [/B] of all standard [B]Governments [/B]in Modern Age, and can select from any of their [B]Celebration effects[/B].[LI][B]+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production [/B]towards constructing the [B]Eiffel Tower[/B].[/LIST]
+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being the French Empire's associated [icon:WONDER] Wonder.
Goisshin
When you Overbuild a [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Building, gain [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science equal to 50% of the Building's [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production cost.

[BLIST][LI]When you [B]Overbuild[/B] a [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] [B]Building[/B], gain [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] [B]Science[/B] equal to [B]50%[/B] of the Building's [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production cost.[LI][B]+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production[/B] towards constructing [B]Dogo Onsen[/B].[/LIST]
+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being Meiji's associated [icon:WONDER] Wonder.
Revolución

Starts with a unique [icon:GOVERNMENT] Government, Revolución. This Government has one [icon:CELEBRATION] Celebration effect, +30% [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for 10 Turns. Cannot enter any other Government type.

[BLIST][LI]Starts with a [B]unique [icon:GOVERNMENT] Government[/B], [B]Revolución[/B]. This Government has one [icon:CELEBRATION] [B]Celebration[/B] effect, [B]+30% [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture[/B] for 10 Turns. Cannot enter any other Government type.[LI][B]+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production[/B] towards constructing [B]Palacio de Bellas Artes[/B].[/LIST]
+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being Mexico's associated [icon:WONDER] Wonder.
Paradise of Nations
+75% to all [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold yields. -25% to all other yields.
[BLIST][LI][B]+75% [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold [/B]yields.[LI][B]-25% [/B]to all other yields.[LI][B]+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production [/B]towards constructing the [B]Red Fort[/B].[/LIST]
+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being Mughal's associated [icon:WONDER] Wonder.
Blood and Iron
+1 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for Military Units for every [icon:PLAYER_RELATIONSHIP_UNFRIENDLY] Unfriendly or [icon:PLAYER_RELATIONSHIP_HOSTILE] Hostile Relationship with another Leader.

[BLIST][LI][B]+1 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength[/B] for Military Units for every [icon:PLAYER_RELATIONSHIP_UNFRIENDLY] [B]Unfriendly[/B] or [icon:PLAYER_RELATIONSHIP_HOSTILE] [B]Hostile[/B] Relationship with another Leader.[LI][B]+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production[/B] towards constructing [B]Brandenburg Gate[/B].[/LIST]
+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being Prussia's associated [icon:WONDER] Wonder.
Kang Qian Shengshi
+4 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold, +4 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture, +2 [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence, but -4 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science per [icon:TRADE_ROUTE] Trade Route.

[BLIST][LI][B]+4 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold[/B], [B]+4 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture[/B], [B]+2 [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence[/B], but [B]-4 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science[/B] per [icon:TRADE_ROUTE] [B]Trade Route[/B].[LI][B]+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production[/B] towards constructing [B]Chengde Mountain Resort[/B].[/LIST]
+30%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being Qing's associated [icon:WONDER] Wonder.
Prosveshchenie
+1 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on Quarters, +1 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science on Quarters in [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Tundra Terrain.

[BLIST][LI][B]+1 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture[/B] on [B]Quarters[/B] and [B]+1 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science[/B] on [B]Quarters[/B] in [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED][B]Tundra Terrain[/B].[LI][B]+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production[/B] towards constructing the [B]Hermitage[/B].[/LIST]
+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being Russia's associated [icon:WONDER] Wonder.
Itsaraphab

Gains a unique [icon:DIPLOMATIC_ACTION] Diplomatic Action to immediately become Suzerain of a [icon:CITYSTATE] City-State at a higher [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence cost than [icon:PROJECT] Befriend Independent.

[BLIST][LI]Gains a unique [icon:DIPLOMATIC_ACTION] [B]Diplomatic Action[/B] to immediately become [B]Suzerain[/B] of a [icon:CITYSTATE] [B]City-State[/B] at a higher [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence cost than [icon:PROJECT] [B]Befriend Independent[/B].[LI][B]+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production[/B] towards constructing [B]Doi Suthep[/B].[/LIST]
+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being Siam's associated [icon:WONDER] Wonder.
